name: YeelightPro(US)
0:
”"Alexa, turn on the light"”
”"Alexa, turn off the light"”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With the Yeelight Pro skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your Yeelight smart lights by voice. To get started, select the ‘Enable Skill’ button in the Alexa App to link your Yeelight Pro account and discover your device(s). 
When using the skill, you need to specify by name which device to use. There are two ways to define this/these name(s):
* Use the name(s) you set up already – these are shown in the Yeelight Pro app and can be changed, or * Create an Alexa group, like Bedroom or Downstairs, and add the device to the group. 
Once you know the name or group of your device(s), you can say the following:
If you have dimmable lights, you can change the brightness, for example: “Alexa, brighten Downstairs to 60 percent", or "Alexa, dim the Living Room lights".
If you have any questions, please visit the Yeelight FAQ at forum.yeelight.com.
